cleaned_text: Herbal Detox Liquid Herbal Extract Blend [](/products/herbal-detox-liquid-herbal-extract-blend) Herbal Detox Liquid Herbal Extract Blend Herbal Detox Liquid Herbal Extract Blend by Herb Pharm Traditional support for lymphatic and glandular detoxification.* Our Herbal Detox compound features Red Clover extract prepared from the flowering herb of Certified Organic Trifolium pratense plants grown on our farms in southern Oregon. It also features Burdock extract prepared from the seed of fully matured second-year Arctium lappa plants. Suggested Use: Shake Well Before Using. Add 1 full squeeze of the dropper bulb to 2 oz. of water or juice, 2 or 3 times per day. Best taken between meals. Ingredients: Extraction rate 126 mg fresh herb & 139 mg dry herb per 0.7 ml. Certified Organic Red Clover flowering herb (Trifolium pratense) Certified Organic Licorice Other Ingredients: certified organic cane alcohol (38-48%) & distilled water. Caution: Do not use in pregnancy or nursing. Do not use in intestinal obstruction, diarrhea, abdominal pain or inflammation. Not for long-term use or in children younger than 12 years old. Keep Out of the Reach of Children. Store away from heat & light.
